short_summary: Purchase of 12 Pumps (6 each for CFB Esquimalt and Halifax)
full_summary:
# Centrifugal Pump Unit Tender Notice

## Issued by: Directorate Maritime Procurement

### Tender Reference Number: cb-6384-36141698

### Amendment: 2

#### Solicitation Number: W8482-241767/A

#### Publication Date: June 14, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date: August 8, 2023

The Department of National Defence invites bids from qualified suppliers for the acquisition of Centrifugal Pumps, as detailed below.

**Specifications and Quantities:**

* Centrifugal Pumps, NSN: 21-904-1976, Quantity: 12 units (6 for CFB Esquimalt and 6 for CFB Halifax)

**Acceptable Products:**

* Part No.: FF704100-0, NCAGE: 05563
* Part No.: FF704100/X6038D, NCAGE: 05563

**Submission Requirements:**

* Proposers must indicate brand name, model, and NCAGE for Equivalent or Substitute Products
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars; foreign currency bids will be rejected

**Language and Documentation:**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)

**Notice URL:**

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6384/rfp-w8482-241767-a-en-amd-1.pdf (English)
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6384/rfp-w8482-241767-a-fr-amd-1.pdf (French)

**Attachments:**

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6384/rfp-w8482-241767-a-en.pdf (English)
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6384/rfp-w8482-241767-a-fr.pdf (French)

**Contacts:**

* Jean-Pierre Normandin, jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca, (819) 939-3674

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (
